Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh took 3 wickets for 47 runs
Nurul Hasan hit a six off Arshdeep Singh
Pre-Game Insights: India captain Rohit Sharma said he never had any doubts about Virat Kohli's form
Rohit Sharma praised KL Rahul's batting and the team's fielding
Rohit Sharma mentioned that Arshdeep Singh was asked to take a tough role in the match
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli said he was happy to contribute to the team's win
Rohit Sharma praised the team's character and fielding
Bangladesh captain Shakib Al Hasan said they were almost there but never crossed the line
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a thriller with Bangladesh needing 151 runs in 16 overs after rain
India won the match by 5 runs (DLS)
Virat Kohli was named the player of the match
